name: Zenith (itch) (MeaLynk)
description:
Trapped on an alien infested space ship. Zenith is a first person action game where you use gravity manipulation gauntlets to kill aliens and explore the space ship.

Credits:

Dalton Morris (Programmer)

Coleman Medcalf (Programmer)
